StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RollbackNWA]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @LeadID uniqueiden..er, @LastEditBy uniqueiden..er = null )
AS BEGIN
BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE LeadStatusDisposi.on SET StatusDisposi.onID = 9, DateUpdated = GETDATE(), UserGUID = ISNULL(@LastEditBy, UserGUID) WHERE LeadID = @LeadID;
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE Lead SET NWARequested_Date = null, NWARequested_UserID = null, NWARequestTypeID = null, NWAApproved_Date = null, NWAApproved_UserID = null WHERE leadid = @LeadID;
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
BEGIN TRANSACTION
UPDATE ApplicantPackage Set DateSubmited = null WHERE LeadID = @LeadID;
-- Rollback the transac.on if there were any errors IF @@ERROR <> 0 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('Error occurred while performing the change.', 16, 1) RETURN END
-- Rollback the transac.on if the number of rows changed does not meet our expecta.on... IF @@ROWCOUNT > 1 BEGIN -- Rollback the transac.on ROLLBACK TRANSACTION
-- Raise an error and return RAISERROR ('An unexpected number of rows were changed.', 16, 1) RETURN END
COMMIT TRANSACTION
END
